mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO,NICK_NAME,PASSWORD,EMAIL,ACTIVE_SCORE,ADMIN,PROFILE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL =#{EMAIL} AND PASSWORD=#{PASSWORD}
SELECT NICK_NAME,PASSWORD,EMAIL,PROFILE,ROWNUM FROM USERS WHERE DEL_GB ='Y'
SELECT NICK_NAME,PASSWORD,EMAIL,PROFILE,ROWNUM FROM USERS WHERE USER_STOP = 'Y'
SELECT NICK_NAME,PASSWORD,EMAIL,PROFILE FROM USERS WHERE USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}, NICK_NAME= #{NICK_NAME}, PROFILE= #{PROFILE} WHERE USER_NO=#{USER_NO}
UPDATE USERS SET DEL_GB = 'Y', DELDATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO =# {USER_NO}
UPDATE USERS SET USER_STOP = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO=#{USERS_NO}
UPDATE USERS SET USER_STOP = 'N', REPORT_COUNT = 0 WHERE USER_NO=#{USERS_NO}
UPDATE USERS SET REPORT_COUNT = + 1 WHERE USER_NO=#{USERS_NO}
UPDATE USERS SET ACTIVE_SCORE = + '' WHERE USER_NO=#{USERS_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO,USERS.NICK_NAME,BOARD.TITLE,BOARD.READ_COUNT,TO_CHAR(BOARD.BOARD_DATE,'YY/DD/mm(HH:MM)') "BOARD_DATE",ROWNUM FROM BOARD INNER JOIN USERS ON BOARD.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO WHERE BOARD.USER_NO = #{USER_NO} AND BOARD.DEL_GB = 'N' AND BOARD.REPORT_COUNT<'20' ORDER BY board.board_date DESC

SELECT PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NAME,PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NO FROM PROJECTBOARD INNER JOIN APPLICATION ON APPLICATION.PROJECT_NO = PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NO WHERE APPLICATION.APPLICATION_AR='Y' AND APPLICATION.USER_NO = ${USER_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE APPLICATION SET APPLICATION_AR = 'N' WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{PROJECT_NO} AND USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NO,PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NAME,to_char(PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_START,'YY-MM-dd') "PROJECT_START",to_char(PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_END,'YY-MM-dd') "PROJECT_END" FROM PROJECTBOARD INNER JOIN APPLICATION ON APPLICATION.PROJECT_NO = PROJECTBOARD.PROJECT_NO WHERE APPLICATION.USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
SELECT TITLE,BOARD_NO from board where BOARD_AR = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_AR = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO}

UPDATE RESUME SET NAME = #{NAME} , TELL = #{TELL} ,EMAIL = #{EMAIL} , ADRESS = #{ADRESS} , ADRESS1 = #{ADRESS1} ,SKILL = #{SKILL} , BLOG = #{BLOG} , FILES = #{FILES} , ZIPCODE = #{ZIPCODE} WHERE RESUME_NO = #{RESUME_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT USERS.NICK_NAME,ROWNUM,FOLLOWER FROM FOLLOW INNER JOIN USERS ON FOLLOW.FOLLOWER = USERS.USER_NO WHERE FOLLOW.USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO,BOARD.TITLE,BOARD.USER_NO,BOARD.BOARD_DATE,ROWNUM FROM SCRAP INNER JOIN BOARD ON SCRAP.BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO WHERE SCRAP.USER_NO = #{USER_NO}
